caption.p: (a) Enzymatic transesterification of 25 mL of discarded cooking oil and methanol (25 °C, 100 rpm, oil:methanol 1:4, 5 g AMNP-CH-OPEr); (b) recyclability of AMNP-CH-OPEr in reactions of 24 h; (c) chromatograms of the reaction mixture at 0 h (upper graph) and 24 h (lower graph). OOO: Triolein; OOP: Palmitodiolein; POS: 1-palmitoyl, 2-oleyl, 3-stearoyl glycerol; PPPo: Palmitoleyldipalmitin.
